description:
A Japanese post office, featuring the „Äí Japanese postal mark on the front of the building.

Microsoft's design previously displayed this mark on its own instead of being featured on the building.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the Japanese post office emoji is a charming representation of a traditional building with an iconic red sign, rendered with Apple's signature 3D glossy shading and smooth gradients. The architectural details are crisp yet softened by realistic lighting, giving it a welcoming and recognizable appearance. This emoji on Apple devices is commonly used to signify mail, correspondence, or a connection to Japan, evoking a sense of reliability and communication.
